description: Template for a National Futsal League page based on that of Dominican Republic, with the purpose of showing the games and statistics of these during the tournament. It is also important to highlight that it has been designed to place sponsorship advertising.

Template for this Classic game that probably will bring some memories to you. You can now play it here and have fun for a while! Do not forget to play hard, we created a machine that will beat you so you do not have it easy. You better whatch out your clicks!
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5v, JavaScript, NPM, Git

description: This template for an online store it's really interactive and with many options to choose and even to expand if needed, this website was created with some technologies such as Bootstrap, JavaScript, and others you can see in details button. hope you like this interactive web application.

description: Hope you enjoy this calculatior app made with react. It's my first project in react requiting my logical skills and having some basic visual skills with react. Hope this project help bigginer to understand better how powerfull is this tool as I wished in the biggining.

description: My first porject handling third party APIs in addition to fetch it using hooks in react. I was able to apply two different types of filtering, one by an usual search bar and another by check mark for pokemon's types. In addition to check the pokemon's specs, such as pokemon #, pokemon name, etc.
technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5v, JavaScript, React, 3rd party API (PokeAPI), NPM, Git
